timeline.subHead1: The idea was proposed by Atul during the first Hackathon we attended, though we didn't win it, The idea stayed with us
timeline.subHead2: We were discussing about ideas to make up a full stack project and this one idea stood out.
timeline.subHead3: We started up with the project, set up a github repository and started coding.
timeline.subHead4: We had good time off College so were coding throughout to finish it as soon as possible.

cards.desc1: Hi There! I designed the frontend of this site. I am a computer science undergrad, currently in my sophomore year. I share a keen interest in Web Development and Deep Learning. Reach out in case of any queries or just want to say Hi!
cards.desc2: Hi There! I designed the backend of this site. I am an information technology undergrad, currently in my sophomore year. I share a keen interest in Web Development and Deep Learning. Reach out in case of any queries or just want to say Hi!
